long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shark.io continues the exciting tradition of .io games. Take on the role of a hungry shark, battling for supremacy in the vast ocean. ğŸŸğŸ– Eat the food you find to grow bigger, but watch out for bigger sharks! It only takes a few seconds for the game to end!

How to Play:

Eat Fish and People: ğŸ ğŸ‘« Eating fish (and people) earns you points and helps you grow.
Watch Out for Bigger Sharks: ğŸ¦ˆ Be cautious of larger sharks; they're powerful but less nimble.
New Players Have an Advantage: ğŸŒŸ Smaller sharks are quicker and can outmaneuver larger ones.
Survive and Grow: ğŸ’ª By living to fight another day, you'll become the biggest fish in the ocean!
Controls:

Dash: Press the mouse button to dash.
Steer: Point the mouse to steer your shark.
Dive in and see if you can become the king of the ocean in Shark.io! ğŸ†

Play more games on the top-left menu.
